verses.verse: Why boast <S%H1984><s%> you yourself in mischief <S%H7451><s%>, O mighty <S%H1368><s%> man <S%H2617><s%>? The goodness of God <S%H410><s%> endures continually <S%H3117><s%>.
Your tongue <S%H3956><s%> devises <S%H2803><s%> mischiefs <S%H1942><s%>; like a sharp <S%H3913><s%> razor <S%H8593><s%>, working <S%H6213><s%> deceitfully <S%H7423><s%>.
You love <S%H157><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> more than good <S%H2896><s%>; and lying <S%H8267><s%> rather than to speak <S%H1696><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
You love <S%H157><s%> all devouring <S%H1105><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>, O you deceitful <S%H4820><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>.

God <S%H410><s%> shall likewise destroy <S%H5422><s%> you for ever <S%H5331><s%>, he shall take you away <S%H2846><s%>, and pluck you out <S%H5255><s%> of your living place <S%H168><s%>, and root you out <S%H8327><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> also shall see <S%H7200><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%>, and shall laugh at him <S%H7832><s%>:

Behold <S%H1397><s%>, this is the man that made <S%H7760><s%> not God <S%H430><s%> his strength <S%H4581><s%>; but trusted <S%H982><s%> in the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of his riches <S%H6239><s%>, and strengthened <S%H5810><s%> himself in his wickedness <S%H1942><s%>.

But I am like a green <S%H7488><s%> olive tree <S%H2132><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>: I trust <S%H982><s%> in the mercy <S%H2617><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you for ever <S%H5769><s%>, because you have done <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H6960><s%>: and I will wait on your name <S%H8034><s%>; for it is good <S%H2896><s%> before your saints <S%H2623><s%>.
